item.title: A nice way to accept Pandas DataFrames as function arguments
item.description: I’m still unsure about whether or not it’s a great idea to use Pandas in application code. It does lots of magic in the background, which makes it feel like a waiting trap for inexperienced / inattentive users. This post mostly discusses some things that I came across while using Pandas in an application and the pitfalls that my team tried to prevent. I recently started working on an existing project that relied on some Python modelling code that uses Pandas.
